attributes.action: Make BLS part of the school curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: I beleive children from a young age should be educated in BLS within their school setting as part of a fundamental structure to their learning and curriculum.
attributes.background: I would like the Goverment to make (BLS) Basic Life Support part of the school curriculum.

rejection.details:
First aid, including life-saving is included in the PHSE curriculum:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1019542/Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education.pdf

If you'd like something else, you could start a new petition explaining what.
